'''0.713''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) is a version of the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on January 31, 2017.

== Fixes ==
* Fix for problems with [[mods]].
* Fix for empty white space.
* {{bug|MCL-5311}}: Unable to update Minecraft Native Launcher.
